description: {"blocks":[{"key":"31nfd","text":"Preventing plate lids from fogging up by applying an anti-condensation agent. This allows longer recordings of e.g. worm behaviour. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f5hit","text":"Make a mixture of 0.05% Triton X-100 and 20% ethanol in a 50 mL test tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8nrk8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5has8","text":"For 20 mL, mix:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6j5so","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"275dc","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4h73m","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"707119E6C5C511EE9AD20A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"99% ethanol","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.1","error":false,"guid":"70711A70C5C511EE9AD20A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"Triton X-100","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"16","error":false,"guid":"70711ADAC5C511EE9AD20A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"sterile water","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"depvi","text":"Treating lids with the anti-condensation agent should be done at least a day before using the plates to study worm behaviour. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":47,"length":54}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"21d5a","text":"Pour the liquid back into the 50 mL tube for later use, or onto new lids to be treated. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4fd2p","text":"After drying, you will most likely see rings of anti-condensation agent residue on the plate. Wipe these off the lids with Kimberly-Clark Kimwipes until there are no signs of these rings. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"74q8t","text":"In a Class II Microbiological Safety Hood, pour ca.   of the anti-condensation agent on the inside of the lids and leave for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":52,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":125,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1pki4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7lj23","text":"Ensure all of the lid is covered by the anti-condensation agent. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3-4","error":false,"guid":"DD0D2A6CC5C711EE9AD20A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3-4","duration":30,"error":false,"guid":"DD0D2B1AC5C711EE9AD20A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"seconds","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"unit":2}}}}
